text: إِنَّ وَلِـِّۧيَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَۖ وَهُوَ يَتَوَلَّى ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
translation: Hakika Mlinzi wangu ni Mwenyezi Mungu aliye teremsha Kitabu. Naye ndiye awalindae walio wema.
footnotes: Hakika msaidizi wangu wa kuninusuru nanyi ni Yeye Mwenyezi Mungu. Ulinzi wangu uko kwake. Naye ndiye aliye niteremshia Qur'ani. Na Yeye peke yake ndiye anaye wanusuru waja wake walio wema.
